    @allure.feature("End to End Journey")
    @allure.story("Full Registration, Login, and Checkout Flow")
    @pytest.mark.e2e
    def test_full_e2e_journey(page: Page, home_page, login_page, checkout_page, random_user):
        """
        Test Case 4 (Full E2E): The Happy Path.
        Simulates a brand new user discovering the site, registering,
        adding an item to the cart, and completing a purchase purely via UI.
        """
        with allure.step("1. Navigate to Home Page and open Login/Register"):
            home_page.navigate_home()
            page.locator("[data-test='nav-sign-in']").click()
    
        with allure.step("2. Complete User Registration"):
            # The login_page contains the register method which clicks the link and fills the form
>           login_page.register(random_user)

    async def wrap_api_call(
        self, cb: Callable[[], Any], is_internal: bool = False
    ) -> Any:
        if self._api_zone.get():
            return await cb()
        task = asyncio.current_task(self._loop)
